string.text: Find the Wish Granter
Finding the Wish Granter is every stalker's dream. There is information that he is exactly inside Chernobyl, in the 4th block.
Meet with Sidorovich
According to stories from the big land, there is somewhere behind the checkpoint a cellar of a merchant who could help me get settled into the Zone.
Meet Colonel Petrenko
Petrenko is waiting for me, you don't have to keep him waiting longer.
Meet Lukash
Freedom leader Lukash wants to meet with you.
Meet Cold
Meet with Cold in the Clear Sky base.
Meet Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov has an assignment for you.
Meet Dushman
Talk to Dushman.
Meet Major Kuznetsov
Report to Major Kuznetsov.
Meet Sultan
Sultan wants to meet with you.
Meet Preacher
Seek guidance from the wise Preacher.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is your next destination.
Meet with Klin
Need to meet Klin, you can usually find him in one of the cellars in the novice village of Cordona.
Meet with Beard
Beard aboard the Skadovsk is your next destination.
Meet with Noah
Noah in Zaton is your next destination.
Meet with Colonel Petrenko
Colonel Petrenko in Rostok is your next destination.
Meet with Gromov
Gromov is a tech at the bar, asked me to help him.
Meet with Mikluha
Mikluha in the Military Warehouses is your next destination.
Meet with Loki
Loki's got some business for me.
Meet with Cold
Ex-bartender wants to discuss something with me.
Meet with Librarian
Librarian in the Great Swamp is your next destination.
Meet with Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov in Yantar is your next destination.
Meet with Garin.
Garin needs my help, he needs a look in his bunker.
Meet with Dushman
Dushman in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Hog
Hog in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Major Kuznetsov
Major Kuznetsov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Lieutenant Kirilov
Lieutenant Kirilov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Sultan
Sultan in Dark Valley is your next destination.
Meet with Olivius
Olivius in Dark Valley is your next destination.
To appear before the Preacher
The Preacher wants me to do the will of the Monolith.
To meet Father Diodore.
Father Diodor made an appointment to give me instructions from Monolith.
Find %s for Clear Sky
Stalker asked me to bring him %s. The deadline is 3 days.
I'm running low on supplies. If you happen to have any on-hand or are willing to bring me some, I would be very grateful.
I have one thing to do. I don't have any money at all, there's nothing to buy with. Could you get me something? I'll thank you as much as I can, maybe I'll get some money by then.

The thing is, I had an argument with a local merchant, and now there's nowhere to get me some consumables. And this motherfucker's got no assortment, so you can get what you need. Maybe you can help me get something.
So... do you have any %s? Or do you know where to get it? Just don't drag it out too long. I think three days would be enough for your eyes. Okay?
Bring me %s %s and I won't be in debt. The sooner you bring it, the better, but in three days you may not even look for me. Okay?
Look, let me think about it, I didn't think you'd be interested... %s %s would have to get it. Your deadline is three days. Can you handle it?
Thank you, man! You're so good. Take the money:
Find %s for Freedom member
Stalker asked me to bring him %s. The deadline is 3 days.
Here's the thing - my stash was robbed, you know? Sounds like he was hiding it well, hell... I didn't have any supplies at all. Could you at least get something?
Man, our merchant isn't provided at all. I thought I'd buy something from him, but I don't. Can you at least get me some supplies somewhere?
There is such a problem, in short, we have supply problems. Our base is far from the perimeter, the goods are difficult to bring. Anyway, can you find something for me?

I don't know what would be more important right away... So... Well, bring me %s, at least %s. Do you have any? Look, when you do, let me know, but don't take too long, you can do it in three days. If you can get it, I won't be in debt.
%s %s have to get it. If you think I'm gonna wait forever, that's not true, three days tops. You got it?
Okay, well, we're gonna have to get more of this. I need %s %s. I'll give you three days to find it. As a reward, I'll give you something. Something like that.
Thank you, you helped me out. Here you go:
Meat for Clear Sky
A Clear Sky fighter asked me to find him the %s. The deadline is 2 days.

I've heard such news recently that the migration of mutants may soon begin, pulling them north. This situation worries me, I'm afraid I'll be left without meat. No, there will be others to replace it, but will they have meat to eat? So I'm going to have a good stock of meat. You gonna help me with this? Follow me if you don't get rusty.

You know, enemies are all about mutant meat being dangerous, with viruses or parasites or whatever the hell it is. I'm gonna fry this on the coals, and there's no time for hunting. Why don't you go hunting for me and get a couple of lumps?

I've recently been told a recipe by men that's exotic, but there's not enough ingredients. And to be more specific, the meat is mutant. I would go hunting myself, because there's no time or opportunity. Why don't you take it, huh?
I need %s, %s. Look, I won't wait weeks, I'll give you two days, tops.
Well, it won't be too hard to get. I need %s, preferably %s. I'll give you two days, or I know I'm a worker, if they don't bring it right away, it means never. Well, do you take it?
%s have to get it and %s, okay? I won't be in debt. Just look, don't take too long with the case. Two days, I think you've had enough.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you stalker, here is your payment. Oh, and here, I have some ammo that is the wrong calibre for my rifle, you can have it.
Find %s for Stalker
%s, the stalker needs that artefact. The deadline is 6 days.
Can you find the artefact? That's the cut right there! Don't think, not for sale or to order, it's different. So you're gonna take it?
Look, I got a friend who's sick, he needs help right away. We should get the artefact alone, they say it has healing properties and I probably have a chance to save it.
I've been involved in this, it's a long story. In short, I owe them an artefact. I tried to find it, but without success. If I don't pay back my debts, I'm finished, will you help me?
How did you even go after the artefacts? Well, I think you can find it, it's not that hard. If you can find %s, let me know. It'll be more than decent, but don't pull it, I need it in six days.
Well, here's the deal: you've got 6 days at most. %s - that's the artifact I need, I'll give you more than what traders or scientists offer. Okay, all right?

Yeah, I'm not really friendly with artefacts myself. Once, it almost took me into a vortex... Well, that's okay. If you don't bring it in within a week, you can't count on a reward. Well, there you go.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been looking for him. There, yes... Here you go:
Find %s for stalker.
%s - we need to get that weapon. The deadline is six days.
Bastards, rats, they're like that in Africa, too, yeah... Anyway, someone robbed my stash and there was a gun... It was like my own. Could you have found a replacement?
There is one problem. The merchants have a very bad assortment, and nothing to order. And I need a weapon, a new one and a whole. You know what I mean?

Look, I lost my gun, maybe it was stolen. Fuck knows, you can't find the end of it now, it's your fault. Can you help me find a replacement like this? I'm not really friends with a local dealer, he's not gonna get me one for sure.

I'm looking for %s. My stash was robbed the other day and my favorite gun was stolen. I loved that gun. But note, if you bring the scrap, it's a small price to pay, I'll have to pay for the repair. I'll give you 6 days to find it.
%s is the one I need. I'll pay according to his condition. Just don't pull it, okay? I'll give you 6 days.
Just keep in mind, if you bring me rusty shit, don't count on big money. I need %s. I won't wait long either, you can find a fucking bald man in 6 days. Okay?
Thank you, brother. I won't forget such help! Now at least I'll go hunting... Here, take my humble reward:
Find %s for duty
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.

I want to ask you to do one thing for me personally, you know? We're in the middle of a territorial war right now. Enemies, you know, enough. I need a reliable weapon that won't let me down or get stuck in a shootout. Can you find one for me?

Yeah, you might as well help me out. My junior partner would be nice to find a bigger gun, Grandpa's TOZ is surely reliable and killer, but he's only good for hunting, you know. Can you give me a hand?

I need to fix my barrel, so I have tools, I have small things, but there are no basic parts to replace, not even the trigger. It's a dead end to go to the local technicians, you know, three hides will pull off the change. In short, I decided to find a donor to replace the parts, and you could help me with that.
My current rifle sucks. I need a weapon that won't wedge through the shot. All right, %s is what I need. Can you get it in, like, 6 days? I won't be in debt.
Okay, let me think about it... We had a few options. %s will do basically, yes. There's definitely enough weeks to look for. And about his condition, the better it is, the more you get. Is that okay?
Specifically, you'll have 6 to 7 days time, a penny depending on the condition of the barrel... Most importantly, I forgot, %s need to get it. Well, somehow.
Perfect! Thing! Here, take the work:
Release from captivity
The stalker's buddy was kidnapped by a group of gangsters, we need to release him. The deadline is 2 days.

I really need help, brother. My friend's been captured by gangsters, demanding big ransom money... I don't have that kind of money at the memorial, but it's unrealistic to collect it in a short time. If I do, I'm not sure they won't kill my friend anyway. I really don't know what to do now. Do you think you can save him? But it has to be done quickly, I don't think they'll hold him for more than 2 days.

Man, you don't look like Rimbaud, but at least you can help me out. We need to get one of the stalkers out of captivity. You see, I owe him my life, and he could actually die because of me now. I know where these freaks are holding him, and I heard they're gonna send him out to dig up radioactive debris for artifacts in a couple of days. They don't live there long, if you didn't know. Can you give me a hand? I won't be in debt.

There's an asshole here who's always in the shit. This time he got grabbed by bandits, and he owes me a lot of money, and I know he has it in his stash. If you take him out and bring him to me, I'll pay you well.
All right, you, I see, a real man! I never hoped to see my friend alive! Here's to worry:
Rescue operation
Get the duty out of captivity. Term of execution - 2 days.

Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken prisoner during a mutant sweep of the area! Got caught up in the hunt and jumped on those scumbags. I'm looking for someone who could save my fellow officer. Can you help save our friend? I don't think they're gonna hold him much longer, try to make it 2 days before he's finished. "Duty" is not going to stay in debt.

You might be able to help. Our scout, my good comrade, has been taken prisoner, and the junkies are now demanding his release. The command still cannot define: to take by force or all the same to execute requirements, and time all goes, already couple of days it has remained to it to live all. Are you going to release him quietly?

Uh, trouble here... Our patrol was attacked by gangster rats at dusk when the guys were on their way back to the barracks. One soldier survived, but he was hardly lucky: he was taken hostage and, imagine, sold to freedom to blackmail us. We still can't get close to our comrade so that he wasn't the first to be shot, fucking grasshoppers have their eyes everywhere. Maybe you could try to free him. There's nowhere else to go. We've got a couple of days left to pay bail.
Thank you, brother. He repulsed our comrade! Well done. Here, take this - from the bottom of your heart:
Help the prisoner
Stalker asked me to rescue a freeman who's being held hostage. The deadline is 2 days.

Help me, help... My partner and I, we're in the middle of something... I'm in a barn, my partner's headed for the bushes. And he's gone. And then yesterday a message came to the PDA, the partner was taken hostage and threatened to sew up, if I do not bring the money in time. I'm desperate, no money, I don't know what to do. The deadline is 2 days. Can you give me a hand?
Thank you, brother. It's great to see your comrade alive again! But you can't put thank you in your pocket. So you'll get it and sign it:
Save a hostage
Save the scientist from captivity. The deadline is 2 days.

Yes, please, help! During the research, our group was attacked and one of my colleagues was abducted. They're demanding a ransom, and they said if he's gone in 2 days, they'll shoot him. Can you help save him?
Thank you, stalker. On behalf of world science, I express my gratitude. It is great to see you and our friend alive again! Here, for your concern:
Hunting a hunter
Stalker asks for help - there is a reward for his head, and he promised to pay twice as much if he manages to finish his customer in 1 day.

Yeah, help me out, brother! Here's the thing... I'm in trouble. A bastard put a price on my head, though it wasn't my fault. Take care of him, and I'll pay double the price. And you have to do it faster than they do, you have 1 day for all.
Oh, thank you, stalker! Here's the reward. I can finally get a good night's sleep for the first time in days!
Vengeance
Stalker asked for revenge for the death of his comrade. The execution time is 2 days.

Last night a bandit snuck into our camp and killed my sleeping friend. There's no mercy for scum like that. Of course, I'm sorry to sign you in the wet, but that bastard didn't deserve another. Kill him for me, stalker, I'll give you 2 days. After that, I'll give you some of my dead friend's things.
Thank you. Join me for a drink to our fallen brother. And take something:
%s for a brother
%s - we need to find this for my brother. The deadline is 3 days.
You need some stuff, you find it?
You want to make some money, don't you? Smarie, I need that stuff. The reward will be, don't worry. Don't pull the current, I need it in 3 days.
Hammer, catch a crab:
%s for the military
%s - we need to find this for a co-worker. The deadline is 3 days.
Soon I'll be on guard duty, and my backpack is almost empty, no first-aid kit, no groceries. Can you give me a hand?
Here's the thing: I join the guard in three days, and I need to get something. I'll give you something as a reward, okay?
Well, thank you, you helped! Here's what I promised:
Find %s artefact
%s - the soldier asked me to find it. The deadline is 6 days.

Look, buddy... I know it's against the rules... I'm going to the demo soon, I'm going home, and I want to bring a souvenir. Well, don't bring home the head of the flesh. Do you think you can find an artifact for me? Just don't pull it, you won't have more than three days. Don't think I'm not gonna get lucky with that fucking stone, I have a hidden container special. I think it's gonna be a great souvenir.
Anyway, can you get me an artifact %s ? You'll get a decent reward. Remember, you have 6 days before I leave.
Well done! All right, give him here... Now the important thing is that the commander doesn't find out. Get back to work, too:
Big deal
%s - get it out and get it to the bandit. Term of execution - 6 days.
Look, there's a case coming up and I need a wave that can't be traced. You know what I mean? Can you help me?
%s is exactly what the doctor prescribed. Where can I get it? Buy it, steal it, find it, I'll have it. I'll pay you double, don't piss, but I need it in six days.
That's what I promised you. And you never saw me, smoked me?
One shot
One soldier bet I couldn't kill an important target. The deadline is two days.

I overheard something with the edge of my ear, made a deal with someone, and there's a case here. I know the location of a particular target with a high priority for elimination. I bet you can't even get close to it, let alone more? If you can, the fee's in half. I'll give you two days.
Really? Did you really do it? Hell, if I'd known you had any chance, I never would have made that bet. Well, a deal's a deal. Here you go:
Order
You signed up for a contract killing. The deadline is two days.

We've received an order from serious people - a stalker must be killed alone. He's just in the middle of a shack. If you kill him, you can keep the hubar. Plus, I'll pay you upstairs. Just keep in mind that the contract has to be completed on time, you don't have more than two days. Okay?
Here's a little cash reward for you, as agreed:
Destroy the enemies.
Attack the infidels for the glory of Monolith. The deadline is 2 days.
Brother, we have found the enemy. We are gathering our brothers for battle. Get over there now. Destroy them. Just don't keep the Monolith waiting, 2 days is the maximum we have.
The Monolith favors us, brother. Take these gifts:
Intelligence
Scout the area where enemy forces were spotted. The deadline is 24 hours.
There's a report of an enemy squad. I'm looking for a scout to prepare an attack. We need to scout the area, but we can't put it off, so, brother, you don't have more than 24 hours.
Wait... That's it. Look at the PDA, the coordinates I sent you. Let's go.
Okay, take these gifts as a token of gratitude:
Destroy the dangerous mutants
Destroy dangerous mutants. The deadline is 3 days.

There's been a lot of dogs lately that haven't been cut, barely had their legs taken away. I'll pay if you reduce their numbers a little, and of course I'll show the PDA their supposed lair. Just don't drag them out before they migrate, okay? Three days, I think that's enough.
So... All right, look at your PDA, I gave you the coordinates. Good luck with that.
Thank you. Take it as a reward:
Clear the area for research
The area where the research will be conducted must be secured. Term of execution - 3 days.

I understand perfectly well that the military must provide for us all, but they are helpless children! I have been entrusted with important research, but there is an obstacle in the form of mutants, which must be removed within a maximum of 3 days. Will you help me remove them?
Thank you, stalker, you helped me. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude:
%s for one of the brothers
One of the brothers is sick. %s will help him. The deadline is 3 days.
I must be strong to serve the Monolith, but I confess my strength is weakening. No matter how you twist it, you also need material means. Can you help me, Brother?
Father Diodore kindly offered to pray for me, but I'm sure I just need treatment. Please bring me this and don't put it off too long, I could die.
Спасибо, брат. Возьми, возьми это:
Search
Stalker gave a lead on a good stash. For a PDA in the stash, he offers a reward. The deadline is 24 hours.

I don't like to make people into postmen, but I have to go now. I know where a good stash with an equally good PDA is. Bring me a PDA from it, I'll pay for it, and the rest is yours. I don't know how long this good stuff's gonna lie there, so don't drag it out for more than 24 hours, okay?
Look in your PDA, I dropped the coordinates. Good luck.
Thank you, stalker! Here, take this:
%s. We need a tissue sample.
%s - the scientist needs a tissue sample from this. The deadline is 3 days.
The job says... I'm researching some mutants in this field. I need someone to collect tissue samples for me, preferably in the shortest possible time and no more than 3 days.
%s is the object of my research. If you could hunt for me, I would pay you for your anxiety and, of course, the considerable risk involved.
Thank you. It'll be very helpful in my research. Please accept:
Postman
Deliver the cargo to the freeman. Delivery time - 3 days.
Buddy, I'm expecting a package and I need someone to pick it up. You want to make some money on it? Look, just don't drag it out, you've had enough for three days.
Thank you, ma'am. As agreed:
Documents for "Clear Skies"
Clear Sky man asked for his papers back.
I have some important documents that I hid when I was attacked by a mutant brat. You know, I'm afraid to go back there. If you can get them, I'd be happy to pay for the job.
Well, you're brave, though! Yes, take your reward:
Defeat Monolith's attack.
The Monolith fighters have been spotted and must be stopped. The deadline is 24 hours.

Man, our valiant intelligence reports that there's a Monolith squad nearby. We should go deal with these freaks. Mikluha doesn't know yet, but we're with the mustache. We just have to do it fast, the maximum you have is 24 hours before they attack or ambush us.
Well done. Mikluha sent reinforcements, but we didn't need them. He asked me to give you this as a reward:
Interception
Intercept enemy forces. The deadline is 24 hours.

Okay, so we have an emergency situation. There are gangsters on the move, I need to warn my superiors immediately and stop them. You need to hold them off until I get back. We need to move out now, 24 hours at the most. Okay?
Молодец, тебе бы да в спецназ. А вот это презент от нас:
Redemption
Kill the enemy of Monolith. The deadline is 2 days.

My brother, the Preacher asked me to kill one of the infidels for the good of Monolith. I failed because I was unable to get to the target. Will you fulfill my task and atone for my failure? There is little time left, two days to be exact.
You've done well. It is an honor to serve the Almighty Monolith with you. Take it, don't be shy:
%s - find it for a mercenary
%s - we need to find this for the mercenary. The deadline is three days.
Would you do me a favor? I need to find some consumables.
I don't have enough supplies. %s is exactly what I could really use right now. Don't pull too hard, I'll give you three days.
Thank you, take the present:
%s - get that trophy
Brother wants meat, specifically - %s The deadline is 3 days.

Anyway. I've spent my whole life in the zone making meat from my grandmother's recipe. When I remember cooking her... Mm-hmm... Dribbling's worse than looking at a live grandmother. Will you get some raw meat?
Specifically, I need %s, %s. I'm not gonna get rusty, bro, just don't fucking pull it, three days is definitely enough for you.
Well done, man. Here:
%s - find a gun for a mercenary
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.
Here's the thing: I need a reliable weapon that won't let me down, that won't jam in a shootout. Can you find one for me?
Okay. %s is just what I need. I won't stay in debt, just don't put it off for long, 6 days is enough for you.
Perfect! Here, take this:
%s - weapons for the military
%s - we need to get these weapons in perfect condition. The deadline is 6 days.
Damn our supply! When they can't even supply a normal barrel. I need a reliable weapon that won't let me down, that won't jam in a shootout. Can you find one for me?
Okay. %s is just what I need. Don't pull, I'm on a raid in 6 days. I won't be in debt.
Well thing! Here, take the work:
Bandit order
You signed up for a contract killing. The deadline is two days.

We've got an order. We're gonna take one down. He's just going somewhere with his habarah. If you kill him, you can keep the habar. Plus, I'll pay you upstairs. You've got two days to do it on time. Is that okay?
Oh, this is a real topic! Here you go:
Destroy the dangerous mutants
Clear the area for Clean Sky from mutants. The deadline is 2 days.

I'm a fighter, like a shitty bullet. Recently mutants bit, creatures, and then came the information that is not only me. We have to kill the creatures. I'll show you on your PDA where I last saw them. And don't take too long until they've gone somewhere, two days, I think you've had enough.
Thank you. Please accept this as a reward:
Destroy dangerous mutants for the glory of Monolith.
Destroy dangerous mutants. That is the will of the Monolith. The deadline is 24 hours.

A monolith in rage at brainless mutants. They killed one of the brothers, and He commanded in His wisdom to make the area safe. You don't have to keep the Monolith waiting, I think you have 24 hours before they kill somebody else.
Praise the Monolith, you're safe and the mutants are dead. Accept these gifts:
Patches for freeman
%s - Freeman asked to get them for him.
Hey, it's hard for our group lately here. Nail a couple of scum all, you take? I will not deprive time.
Well, such a thing - it is necessary to kill carrion, and it does not matter which one. % s - bring me this as proof, for example,% s. I would have been calmer.
Respect bro! Hold:
Tear off chevrons for a loner
%s - the Duty man asked me to collect this for him.
Duty cleans the Zone not only from mutants, but also from bastards and all kinds of freaks. Something must be generated from their corpses. I will not limit in time.
Do not take a break from these freaks lately. % s - bring me% s as evidence for the work done. Good luck.
Thank's man. Here, take it, while no one sees:
Find patches for stalker
%s - the stalker asked to rip it off for him.
I think it will be easier for all of us if the population of freaks in the zone is significantly reduced. We need to collect something from the corpses. I will not deprive time.
%s %s - as evidence by itself. These freaks got me already, and it doesn’t matter who you fill up, the main thing is the stripes. And I'll give you something for this.
Well thanks brother, bother. Hold:
Bring patches to brother
%s - the bandit asked me to sabotage it.
What I've been doing here, I've got to cut the tails, here. So, what do you think?
Anyway, cormorants are divorced apparently, invisibly, they don't even get squeezed. If you get it %s %s, we'll get together on good money, what do you think?
Bro, nice job. Well, my respect to you, take this:
Stalker Equipment
%s - the stalker asked me to find it. It's a 2-day runtime.
Uh, my gear broke down... Could you get me something?

%s - find me a new one, I need one. Mine's completely worn out in the holes, except now you can let it in for patches. I'll give you a couple of days, or you'll have to buy a new one yourself. So, how are you?
Thank you, here you go:
Get a device
%s - the stalker asked me to find it for him. Execution time is 2 days.
Look, I lost my fucking device here. Or maybe it was stolen by someone... Can you help me get a new one?

If you're more specific, I need %s. If you bring it to me someday, I'll throw in some money, maybe something else. Just don't drag it out, I'll give you two days, or you'll have to buy a new one. Well, how's that, huh?
Oh, thank you, man. Here's the money:
Supplies for stalker
%s - the stalker asked to find it for his needs. Exection time is 3 days.
I need to get something. Could you get me one?
%s %s must be cut. I don't have the money yet, but then, you know, I'll either live or give you something as a reward. Do you agree?
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Horns, hooves and tails
%s - the stalker asked me to find it. Exection time is 3 days.
I have one job. Could you get some mutant parts for me?

%s can you get it? Well, at least %s. I have a hobby, you see. Or a craft, you might say. Anyway, I make stuff out of spare parts, souvenirs like people from the Big Land order them from me. The deadline is three days for you so I can make them. Agreed? If not, I'll find somebody else.
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Destroy the lair of mutants.
Stalker asked me to clean out the lair. The execution time is 2 days.
I have a job for hunters. You're not one of them by chance? My partners and I are in the way of mutants, we need to clear their lair.
Thank you, man. Here's the money:
Pay back the debts.
We need to beat the debt out of this stalker any way we can. Execution time is 2 days.

Well, that's the way it is, the collector needs a little extra work. Even though there are no banks in the Zone, but somebody still has to do their job. We mercenaries often lend money. But sometimes they don't want to give it back, that's the problem. We have to press someone, the ladies have 2 days. And you'll get a percentage salary, of course.
You know, like a real collector. Maybe a permanent fixture with us, huh? Here's a percentage:
Pay back
This freak owes his brothers. The execution time is 2 days.

Anyway, fuck, I've got one of these: the Fray has got the coast mixed up. He borrowed the money and went missing, really. We should check him out, give him a pamper, explain where. So, what's up, okay? I'll give you 2 days and a share if you do.
Nah, well, that's the real deal, bro. Take your percentage:
Debtor
We need to repay this stalker's debt to the borrower. Exection time is 2 days.

Yeah, I got a nasty case... I lent it to a stalker I once knew. It's okay, but he's not going to pay me back, and I really need the money now. I need somebody to talk to him and convince him to return what he promised. I'll give you 2 days, okay? And a retainer of something of its own.
It was bad for him, of course... What the hell happened to him. I told you I was broke, so sorry, I can't give you any money. But I've got some rainy-day expenses. Here, take this:
Duty debt
We need to repay this stalker's debt to the Duty man. The execution time is two days.

Well, there is one nasty business. There's a stalker who owes me money, I need to talk to him seriously. I can't do it myself, you know, I can't do it here, and in this rank... You're gonna go and do it with him, aren't you? I'll give you 2 days for everything, of course.
Well, he did it, it was unpleasant, of course. Okay, I don't give a shit about bothering myself here. Take a percentage:
Freedom debt
Freeman asked me to repay this stalker's debt to him. The execution time is 2 days.

Hey, man, there's a little dirty work to do. A guy borrowed money from me, and he's not gonna pay me back, I guess. You should go with him and have a good time, huh? I'll give you two days, or I'll find someone else. And as a reward, I'll give you a percentage. Okay?
Respect you for taking on such a weird case, but money doesn't smell, does it? Hold the interest, man:
Fix the problem
Stalker asked me to secure the area. The execution time is 2 days.

Well, let's just say I don't have a stalker job... I do have another one. Me and my band are getting in the way alone, constantly creating problems for us, and not only us. Their camp isn't far away. If you smoked them out of there, we'd really appreciate it.
Well, money doesn't smell, does it? Here you go:
Resource support
%s - the ecologist asked to get it for him. Exection time is 2 days.

Yes... You know, it's hard in the Zone. Often the necessary resources for environmentalists are delayed, cancelled or something. Of course, we don't get paid, and we can't trade anything except with rare stalkers. Can you get some supplies for me? I'll give you something in return.
%s can be eaten with %s? Or you can find it. Just don't pull it, if not, I'll give you 2 days. Okay?
Thank you so much, here, take this:
Meat for freeman
%s - freeman asked me to get this for him. Exection time is 2 days.
Look, I have one idea. The guys said if you try to kick some dope off some meat, you're gonna pump it up. You gonna get it for me?
%s is kind of good for it, %s is just enough for me. Well, it's worth a try. I'll give you 2 days to find it. You got it?
Okay, today will be fun. And your fee:
Radioactive meat lover
%%s - the stalker asked him to get it. The lead time is 2 days.
Man, I'm here for a long time, but I can't live here without juicy, fried meat. Even if it's radioactive, fuck it. I'm willing to pay you if you get me a couple of pieces of raw mutant meat.
Of course, if you're interested. %s %s can you get it? Well, I'll give you 2 days. Well, is it interesting or not?
Mm-hmm... I can already smell that divine taste. Take it as a token of gratitude:
Meat for a soldier
%s - the warrior asked me to bring him this. The time of execution is 2 days.

You know, feeding and our dried people leave much to be desired, we have to interrupt something. I don't think I've been here long enough, but I've been burned to mutant meat. I can't do it without it, you know? Could you get me some?
%s %s can you get it? Only if you take it, don't drag it out, I'll give you 2 days. Well, do you want to know?
Oh, I'll be right back at the base, click on my grandmother's recipe... Okay, okay, that's all later. Here's your fee.:
Meat for a soldier
%s - soldier asked me to bring him this. Execution time is 2 days.

You know, feeding and our dried people leave much to be desired, we have to interrupt something. I don't think I've been here long enough, but I've been burned to mutant meat. I can't do it without it, you know? Could you get me some?
%s %s can you get it? Only if you take it, don't drag it out, I'll give you 2 days. Well, do you want to know?
Oh, I'll be right back at the base, click on my grandmother's recipe... Okay, okay, that's all later. Here's your fee:
Muscle tissue samples
%s - the ecologist asked me to get him this. Execution time is 2 days.
I collect tissue samples for one research institute, but I'm not on time. I have a contract with them, quite a large sum. If you helped me out, we could split the money.

So... Now, I'm just gonna look at the PDA to see what else is on the list... %s is still to be obtained in %s. The rest is partially there, and part of it won't be difficult for me to find. I have to deliver all this in two days, so you can't drag it out. Well, you want to know?
Well, that's good. Take it, it's your honestly earned:
Anomalous sample for ecologist
%s - the ecologist needs this artefact. The deadline is 6 days.
Yeah, here's the thing. My colleague and I suspect one abnormal sample of hidden properties. But there's no way we can find it for our research. Maybe you can help us?

%s - that's the so-called artifact we need, more specifically. Only if you're interested, don't pull it, okay? I'll give you 6 days for everything, and the money, of course, if you do your job. Well, what is it?
Well, finally. Here's the promised fee:
Artefact for Clear Sky
%s - Clear sky fighter needs this artifact. The deadline is 6 days.
I have one request. I've been instructed to retrieve the artifact. But, you know, I'm more of a mutant hunter. I don't have the equipment or the experience to do it. Can you give me a hand?
%s could you find it? I would give you something as a reward. I have to get it in 6 days, and I have no idea where to get it. Well, can you give me a hand?
Well, thank you, brother. That's what I did. Take the reward:
Gift for brother
%s - my brother asked me to find him this. The deadline is 6 days.
Fuck, there's one theme. Yesterday, Koresh made such feints with one schmartefact, the guys take the jealousy. It's a really cool topic. Will you get me one of these, too?
%s, I think that's what they called him. Don't pull your cat's tail, okay? I'm waiting for him in 6 days. So are you gonna do it or are you gonna do it?
Well, now my buddy's gonna be jealous. Give me a hand, here's your cut:
Subcontractor
%s - the mercenary asked me to find it. The deadline is 6 days.
You know, I need an assistant. I've got orders piled up, I can't straighten out, I just can't make it. Do you want to be a subcontractor? The artifact needs to be found.
%s - in 6 days, the customer wants to see this artifact in his hands. The money is quite good he pays, and I will, of course, share it with you. Is that okay?
Well, now my buddy's gonna be jealous. Give me a hand, here's your cut:
Gun for the freeman
%s - the freeman asked me to get this weapon for him. The deadline is 6 days.
М... There is one theme. I need some weapons, but I don't have much money. If you got it, uh, somewhere, I'd be willing to pay a little over half its real value.
%s could you find it? I'll give you a 6 day deadline. Just keep in mind I don't need the scrap. Okay?
Man, thank you. Take what's due:
Sample Supplies
%s - Clear Sky man asked me to find this. The lead time is 3 days.

You probably know that most of the most different pieces from the Zone have already been investigated? I mean artifacts there, spare parts for mutants ... But Clear Sky has its own, so to say, supply chain. I can help you sell parts of the mutants, but I'll take a percentage.

%s - this is what the customer needs right now. If you get it within 3 days and bring it to me, then everything will be the way. If you don't meet the deadline - well, you know, the money will float away.
So come on here ... Here's your share:
To fulfill His will
%s - a monolith asked to find this weapon for him. The deadline is 6 days.
Brother, I can't afford to buy, and I don't know where to get these weapons. Will you help me?
%s - can you find it for me? I don't have money, but I can thank you properly. I will give you 6 days of search time.
Listen, I was able to get money, take:
Wholesale supply
% s - the freeman asked me to find this. The execution time is 3 days.
We, freedom, have a market for mutant parts bump by bump, we supply them there in bulk. You wanna get involved?
%s %s - find it for me in three days, and then you get lava. Well, are you interested or not?
Okay, give me that... Here's your cut:
Biological drugs
%s - the ecologist asked me to get this. The execution time is 3 days.

You know, personally, I don't have enough material for my research. I'm willing to pay a lot more than the dealers or anyone else if you get me biological material from which I can make drugs. How's that?
Okay, wait a second... %s, yes. This is what you need to find, preferably in the shortest possible time and preferably in %s. But the maximum I can give is 3 days, no more. Agreed?
Well, now things will go better, and my doctorate is just around the corner. And this is for you:
Order for mutants parts
%s - the mercenary asked me to get it. It's a 3 day runtime.
Yeah, you know, we could make some money together. One of my trustees ordered some mutant parts. I don't have time to do everything myself. We'll split the proceeds.
Interested? Well, then listen. %s %s is what you need to get within 3 days. So, are you okay?
All right, here we go. Keep your cut:
Intermediary Mediator
%s - the debtor asked to get it. The lead time is 3 days.
You know that we, ordinary duty fighters, are paid to surrender parts of the mutants? We have a mediator. If you want, you can bring me what is now a priority.
Well look, such a scheme. You bring me %s, %s, and divide the proceeds, of course, in your favor, but I still didn't even lift a finger. Is coming?
Here, both you and me are profitable. Take it:
Release comrade
The fighter of Clear Sky was captured, you need to free him. The lead time is 3 days.

Recently, my detachment was ambushed by bandits; I left almost the whole, like most of the other guys. But one was seriously injured, and we had to abandon him. As it turned out later, he was captured. Listen, I don't want to take another risk, so I'm looking for someone who could rescue him. Will you help?
Well, the main thing is that he delivered him alive. Thanks:
Freedom for free
Swobovets signed me for mokruha. The lead time is 3 days.

Dude, there are such assholes that make it hard for everyone. So I happened to know this. Could you free him from this mortal body, huh? No matter why, it's better not to know the details. Of course, throw some money.
Well, something like that, well, that's what I promised:
Cleaning
Duty man asked to eliminate this target. The lead time is 3 days.
You know, I have personal accounts with one bastard. If you can finish it somewhere quietly - I'll dump the dough, Debt will not remain in debt. Well, interested in this?
Now, my soul is calmer. And this is a gift from me:
Parcel
Stalker asked me to deliver the shipment to another stalker. The execution time is 2 days.

Well, listen, maybe you'll be interested. It's a safe job, but it's depressing, and I wouldn't say it's easy. I'm gonna need some supplies delivered to a certain unit within a certain time frame, two days in particular. Delivery by courier, if I may say so. Interested?
Great, I've already been informed that the cargo has been delivered. It's your payment:
Delivery
Clear Sky man ordered me to deliver a package. The execution time is 2 days.

Did you ever have to work as a courier? Well, listen, you gotta get the stuff from point A to point B within a couple of days, if you know how to get past the danger, you can do it without a problem. You're gonna take it from me.
Great, I've already been informed that the cargo has been delivered. It's your payment:
Service
I promised to brother to give some clothes up. The execution time is 2 days.
Bro, I'm looking for some peppers to carry them. I'll give you a couple of days. If you happen to be missing any niches, you're a dead man, that's the way it is. Interested?
Okay, my buddy threw a malevolent that everything's tip-top. Here's your part:
Strategic supplies
The duty man instructed me to deliver the supplies to the unit. The execution time is 2 days.
You looking for a job? Yeah, there's a job you can do right now. In short, you have to deliver supplies to my subordinate, he's on a mission right now. If you want, I'll tell you more.
Well done, you did good. Here's your reward:
Courier
Freeman has instructed me to deliver supplies to the unit. The execution time is 2 days.
There's a little work to do. If you have enough strength, I can offer you a job as a courier. The package isn't too heavy, I'll pay you when you get back to me. I'll give you about 2 days time.
Great, I've already been informed that the cargo has been delivered. It's your payment:
Army supplies
The military ordered me to deliver the army supplies. The execution time is two days.
Okay, so there's a very important task. We need to deliver my colleague's supplies, safe and sound. You'll have up to 2 days.
Well done, take it:
Delivery contract
We need to deliver a shipment to the Stalker squad. We've got two days to do it.

You know, I have an extra contract. You know, there's no transport in the zone and you have to carry all the goods on your hump, and if you want to carry it on yours. You're gonna have the right weight.
Great, I've already been informed that the cargo has been delivered. It's your payment:
Resource Supplies
The ecologist asked me to deliver the cargo. The execution time is 2 days.

You know, I have a delicate matter for you. It is necessary to deliver some things to my colleague, I will tell you right away that the payment will be when you return to me, you will have about two days, and in case of loss of cargo, it is better to worry about your safety. It sounds formidable, but if you're an honest man, you'll be fine. Interested in the job?
Great, I've already been informed that the cargo has been delivered. Your payment:
Who are you? Have you come to save me, stalker?
Just don't hit me, please... Or did you come to help out?
I don't know, I don't know! Get off me already! Wait, you're not one of these? I knew they'd save me!
If you want to live, come with me!
Special order: pick up the goods
The order has been delivered, you need to take it from Nimble.
Special order: wait for delivery
The order's been placed. We have to wait until Nimble gets the goods.

It is necessary to urgently run to the nearest shelter and hide from the blowout.
You must never leave the shelter during emission.
Emission: find shelter
Emission: Wait in the hideout

The radioactive fallout is beginning.
Dangerous levels of radiation. We need shelter.
Never leave the shelter during the radioactive fallout.
Radioactive rainfall: find shelter
Radioactive rainfall: wait in the shelter
Warning!
The radioactive fallout has stopped.
Warning!
It's starting to rain acid.
Hazardous level of chemical contamination. Need shelter.
You must never leave the shelter during the acid rain.
Acid rain: find shelter
Acid rain: Wait in the shelter
Warning!
The acid rain has stopped.
Warning!
A psy-storm coming on.
It is necessary to urgently run to the nearest shelter and hide from the psi-storm.
You must never leave the hideout during a psych storm.
Psi-storm: Find a hideout
Psi-storm: Wait in hiding.

Psi-storm's over.
